alert.note: Alert for Warren (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 18 at 3:57AM EST until February 18 at 8:32PM EST by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers... Little Miami River at Kings Mills. Little Miami River at Milford. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM EARLY THIS MORNING THROUGH THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Little Miami River at Kings Mills. * WHEN...Until this evening. * IMPACTS...At 22.0 feet, Low-lying roads are affected in South Lebanon including South Main and McKinley Streets and King Avenue. Some homes near the river incur basement flooding in South Lebanon. Lowland flooding can be expected elsewhere in Warren County near the Little Miami River including Mason-Morrow-Millgrove Road. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1:46 AM EST Friday the stage was 20.3 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 1:46 AM EST Friday was 20.3 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 20.8 feet this morning. It will then fall below flood stage this afternoon. - Flood stage is 17.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Stay tuned to developments by listening to NOAA Weather Radio. For additional details on river forecasts, visit water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=iln
